thread.title: Kelly LaPolla Hooge
thread.title_full: LOLA reviewed by Kelly LaPolla Hooge

author: Kelly LaPolla Hooge
title: Kelly LaPolla Hooge
text: These products are natural and clean and I don't have to worry about exposing myself to toxic chemicals every month. I don't have to worry about running out either - they arrive at my doorstep! And you can customize exactly what you need. All this and the prices are still competitive!
